ing: 1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers
des: "This is a simple recipe for a satisfying spicy chicken soup. Green chilies, onion and garlic make this a good soup for people with a cold."
ins: Heat olive oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Saute onion, green pepper and garlic until tender. Stir in chicken broth, chicken pieces and the diced tomatoes and chilies. Simmer covered for at least 10 minutes. Serve hot.
